page.title: 01Auchtermuchty and District
page.content: Our block is made up of{farmland, {forestry,}and most of{Auchtermuchty.} There is an especially interesting farm,{Reedie Hill,}which is a{Deer {Farm.}Auchtermuchty has a number of attractions.{Jimmy Shand,}the famous accordion player and dance band leader,lives there,and there are some old{thatched cottages,}and old houses with{marriage lintels.}There is a{post {office, a bank, a building society,} and various shops.There is also a foundry, the{United Agricultural {Merchants,}and a{granary.} There are 3 hotels, and 1 public house. There is a{park, bowling green {and many clubs and organisations.}The{ {Primary School}has about{200 pupils. Auchtermuchty is an attractive town to live in and it's easy to{commute}to one's work in the towns and cities.
